episodes.title: No Place Like Home
episodes.plot: Bea Smith enters prison after being charged with the attempted murder of her husband. Bea is separated from her daughter and sent to Wentworth on remand. She is then forced to learn how the prison works.

episodes.title: Fly Me Away
episodes.plot: In the aftermath of the riot, Will blackmails Doreen into helping him and Bea is given no choice but to continue to lie.

episodes.title: The Girl Who Waited
episodes.plot: Bea gets caught in between rivals Jacs and Franky. While Erica gets the staff offside with forced changes to the 'Wet Cells'.

episodes.title: The Things We Do
episodes.plot: Franky teaches Bea a tough lesson; Liz struggles with old demons; Franky stirs up new feelings in Erica.

episodes.title: The Velvet Curtain
episodes.plot: Erica can't escape her feelings for Franky and Bea reveals to Liz the truth about her marriage.

episodes.title: Captive
episodes.plot: Bea feels threatened when Harry says he may not be able to deal with their daughter any longer. Vera's mother reveals a long standing lie to the staff.

episodes.title: Something Dies
episodes.plot: Will realises he can't keep on holding onto the past as Bea crosses Jacs with dangerous consequences, Doreen can no longer be stuck in Jacs and Franky's war.

episodes.title: Mind Games
episodes.plot: To gain back control of Wentworth, Jacs makes a final play to break Bea.

episodes.title: To the Moon
episodes.plot: Bea is buoyed by the inmate's support, while Jacs's power further diminishes and Vera and Fletch's date comes to a humiliating end.

episodes.title: Checkmate
episodes.plot: The truth behind the riot is finally revealed and Bea confronts a killer leading to deadly consequences.
